verbose_text: In mice treated with hCLIP85 : CFA prior to infection, a large fraction (25%, equivalent to approximately 6000 cells / brain; XREF_TABLE) of CNS derived TCLi T cells produced IFN-gamma in response to stimulation with cognate peptide (XREF_FIG, XREF_TABLE) in the absence of adoptive transfer of MHV-immune cells.
evidence: CNS-derived TCLi T cells produced IFN-gamma
